title: Social Constructivist Simulation Training for Inclusive Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Building an inclusive educational environment in response to Society 5.0, featuring collaborative language learning simulations that reflect diverse learning needs

learning_goals: Learners can reduce language barriers for multicultural learners by more than 30% through collaborative activities based on social constructivism in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can design five or more language tasks reflecting diverse learner needs by applying inclusive learning design in digital platforms and BYOD environments.
Learners can produce a final output—a language education scenario applying inclusive learning design principles—through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
